titleInfo.title: Hawkins v. Medtronic, Inc. et al
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER entering a STAY of proceedings, including a stay of Medtronic's deadline to respond to the First Amended Complaint and VACATING the Scheduling Conference currently set for 2/10/2015. A status report or voluntary dismissal is due within sixty (60) days of this Order. Order signed by Magistrate Judge Sheila K. Oberto on 1/6/2015. (Timken, A)
